Description: It is said you may eat it if you ever need to break an illusion at Dahut. But be cautious.
AvailableAt: $Fathomking's Hold -> ファザムキングの砦, [Ss]cintillack -> シンティラック, Fathomking -> ファザムキング$Available for one Scintillack at the Fathomking's Hold; counteracts illusion at Dahut.
Name: White Mollyflower
